short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your favorite websites or save opened tabs, if you may need them in future, with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save all your currents tabs with one click!

Open all webs of a folder also with one click.

Easiest way to search and organize your bookmarks.
